resources.name: AWS MCP Server
resources.description: Features multiple Python environment setup options with detailed code style guidelines, comprehensive error handling recommendations, and security considerations for AWS CLI interactions.
resources.author: alexei-led

resources.name: Giselle
resources.description: Provides detailed build and test commands using pnpm and Vitest with strict code formatting requirements and comprehensive naming conventions for code consistency.
resources.author: giselles-ai

resources.name: HASH
resources.description: Features comprehensive repository structure breakdown with strong emphasis on coding standards, detailed Rust documentation guidelines, and systematic PR review process.
resources.author: hashintel

resources.name: JSBeeb
resources.description: Provides development guide for JavaScript BBC Micro emulator with build and testing instructions, architecture documentation, and debugging workflows.
resources.author: mattgodbolt

resources.name: LangGraphJS
resources.description: Offers comprehensive build and test commands with detailed TypeScript style guidelines, layered library architecture, and monorepo structure using yarn workspaces.
resources.author: langchain-ai

resources.name: Metabase
resources.description: Details workflow for REPL-driven development in Clojure/ClojureScript with emphasis on incremental development, testing, and step-by-step approach for feature implementation.
resources.author: metabase

resources.name: SG Cars Trends Backend
resources.description: Provides comprehensive structure for TypeScript monorepo projects with detailed commands for development, testing, deployment, and AWS/Cloudflare integration.
resources.author: sgcarstrends

resources.name: SPy
resources.description: Enforces strict coding conventions with comprehensive testing guidelines, multiple code compilation options, and backend-specific test decorators for targeted filtering.
resources.author: spylang
